name: Infernal Astaroth
description: A demonic entity engulfed in perpetual flames, commanding the power of the inferno.

passive.name: Molten Aura
passive.description: When Astaroth is hit, the attacker takes 20% of Astaroth's Magical Damage as magical damage.

abilities.name: Blazing Ball
abilities.description: Hurls a massive ball of fire at a single target, dealing 1200 magical damage.

abilities.name: Explosion
abilities.description: Deals 600 (+100% MD) magical damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Molten Armor
abilities.description: Grants 50% bonus Armor and Magic Shield for 5 turns. When the effect expires or is removed, deals 50% MD magical damage to all enemies.
